definition: a colorless Mexican liquor distilled from fermented juices of certain desert plants of the genus Agavaceae (especially the century plant)
details:
noun
- a colorless Mexican liquor distilled from fermented juices of certain desert plants of the genus Agavaceae (especially the century plant)
- a small spineless globe-shaped cactus
= example: a small spineless globe-shaped cactus
= synonyms: peyote
